subject: Re: Changes to Movewell page on wolper website
preview: Hi Michelle,  This is Adriane jumping in for Marcelo.  I am writing to confirm that the MoveWell page updates went live successfully as scheduled at 9:00 AM Sydney time today.  The main link (https://

full_threads.body:
Hi Michelle,

This is Adriane jumping in for Marcelo.

I am writing to confirm that the MoveWell page updates went live successfully as scheduled at 9:00 AM Sydney time today.

The main link (https://wolper.com.au/services/movewell) is now displaying the updated "v2" content, including the correct buttons and section ordering.

Please let us know if you spot anything else you need adjusted. Otherwise, we hope you had a wonderful New Year celebration!

Hey Team!

I've now prepared for the site to go live on January 2, 2026 9AM, Sydney Time.

Everything should be up and running, and we will return to this ticket once the date is settled.

That's great Marcelo.
I really appreciate your help!

Hi Michelle,

Thank you for confirming!

We’ll go ahead and make the MoveWell Exercise Program v2 page live on Friday, 2nd January at 9am (Sydney time), replacing the current page at https://wolper.com.au/services/movewell.

Everything is fully ready on our side, and we’ll ensure the transition is smooth. We’ll keep an eye on the page after it goes live to make sure everything is working perfectly. As always, we’re happy to help with any tweaks or questions you might have.

We’re looking forward to seeing this live and continuing to support you with the MoveWell pages.

Hi Marcelo,

Everything is great now.
Thank you for your patience.

Could you please make the page at https://wolper.com.au/services/movewell-exercise-program-v2/ go live and replace
the current movewell page (https://wolper.com.au/services/movewell )
on at 9am (sydney) Friday 2nd January?

Have a happy new year and thank you once again,

Michelle.
(Time: 15mins)

Hi Michelle,

Thanks for your feedback. I’ve made the updates to the buttons on the left-hand side of the MoveWell test page as requested:

  • Red button: Casual MoveWell class booking
  • Green button: 11-week term payment (Monday, Friday, Saturday classes)
  • Light blue button: 12-week term payment (Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday classes)

Everything is now updated on the test page and ready for review.

Would you like us to go ahead and push these changes live now, or is there anything else you’d like adjusted before we do so?

We’ll keep an eye on things and are always happy to help!
(Time: 30mins)

Thank you Marcelo,
Things are going well.

I have received some feedback about the wording of the buttons on the left-hand side of the test Movewell page.

Could you please change the red button to say: Casual MoveWell class booking
Please change the green button to say: 11-week term payment (Monday, Friday Saturday classes)
Please change the light blue button to say: 12-week term payment (Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday classes)

Apologies for the hassle,

Michelle.

Hi Michelle,

Happy Tuesday!

Thank you for providing the detailed instructions. We’ve updated the MoveWell test page on https://wolper.com.au/services/movewell-exercise-program-v2/ according to your latest directions.

Here’s a summary of what’s been updated:

Left Side:
  • Added the purple button “How to book your MoveWell classes” linking to the new page.
Right Side:
  • Top red Casual Class Booking button left as-is
  • Middle green button updated to “Click here for term payment – 11-week term” with the correct link
  • New light blue button added for 12-week term with the correct link
Lower Section:
  • Videos and green info box reordered so MoveWell Class Fees and enquiry box appear first, followed by the videos

The test page is now fully updated and ready for your review. Please take a look when you have a chance, and let us know if there’s anything else you’d like adjusted.

In the meantime, we’ll keep an eye on things to make sure everything is running smoothly. We're always happy to help!

Hi Marcelo,

Thanks for the updates to the test page -> https://wolper.com.au/services/movewell-exercise-program-v2/
I have changed my mind on what I think we should do here.
Could you please update the test page with the current content on https://wolper.com.au/services/movewell and then make the following changes.


  1. Left side
    Please add the button shown below in purple - How to book your MoveWell classes This should link to our new page
    https://wolper.com.au/how-to-book-your-movewell-classes/




  1. Right side
    At the moment there are two buttons. I would like to make a change to the existing green button and add a new one

    1. Top red casual class booking button - please leave as is
    2. Middle green button
      Please edit text to - Click here for term payment - 11-week term (for current MoveWell participants)
      Please make sure it links to the 11-weeks payment script
    3. Add a new button underneath - please make it light blue
      Text - Click here for term payment - 12-week term (for current MoveWell participants)
      Please link to the 12-week payment script


  2. Further down the page, could you please change the order of the videos shown and the content in the green section, so that the MoveWell Class Fees and enquiry box are shown first, and then the videos.


Thank you Marcelo,

Michelle.
Closing this this ticket, as the client has mentioned the new task in a new thread: https://secure.helpscout.net/conversation/3179665441/183379?viewId=8874269
Hey @allieB, Apologies for missing the tags last time, thanks for adding them for me. I’ll make sure to include them going forward. 🙏

Hi Marcelo,

I have additional changes but I am running out of time to get them to you.
Will you be working next week?

Merry Christmas!

Michelle.
(Time: 30mins) time only after tagged is added, waiting for customer reply closing for now
Hey @marcelo please don't forget to add the tags please. Added it for you for now (since the charge only works tag-> charge)
(Time: 30mins)

Ticket Summary – MoveWell Page Update (Draft Page)

Request: Update the MoveWell test page with new content regarding how to book.

Actions Taken:
  • Clarified which section of the page needed updating.
  • Applied the requested changes on the test page for client review.
  • Test page link provided: MoveWell Test Page

Next Steps:
  • Await client confirmation or feedback on the draft.
  • Make any additional adjustments as requested.
  • Prepare the page for going live once approved.

Notes:
  • This is still a draft; client review is needed.
  • Team available to make further edits and ensure everything is correct before launch.

Hi Michelle,

Thanks again for clarifying earlier.

Just a quick update, we’ve gone ahead and applied the changes on the draft page for you to take a look at: MoveWell Test Page

Please have a look when you get a chance and let us know if everything looks good, or if there’s anything you’d like us to adjust.

Once we hear back from you, we can make any tweaks and get the page ready to go live. In the meantime, we’ll keep an eye on things to make sure everything is running smoothly. We're always happy to help!

Hi Michelle,

Thanks so much for clarifying! No worries at all, we’ve got it.

We’ll proceed with updating the Left-Hand Column as intended and make sure everything is set up exactly how you’d like.

I’ll keep you posted as soon as the changes are ready to review.

Hi Marcelo,

I did indeed get my right and left mixed up. I meant left.

Thank you,

Michelle.
